site_name: Ground Floor391 Ewell RoadSurbitonKT6 7DG
decision_conditions: Under Schedule 2, Part 3, MA.1. (1)(a) of Class M Part 3 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval is required and refused. The application site fails to comply with the vacancy requirements, with the premises understood to be in operation under Use Class E (former B1) at the time of assessment. Insufficient evidence has been submitted by the applicant to otherwise demonstrate that the application site has been vacant for the required length of time.

Under Schedule 2, Part 3, MA.1. (1)(g)(i) of Class M Part 3 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval is required and refused. The proposed development is of a description falling within Class O of this Part as that Class had effect immediately before 1st August 2021.

Under Schedule 2, Part 3, M.2(1)(a) of Class M Part 3 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval is required and refused. The proposal would be contrary to, in particular, the aims and objectives of the Nationally Described Space Standards (2015) and Policy D6 of the London Plan (2021) owing to its failure to provide sufficient information / evidence to demonstrate that the proposed development would meet the required floor to ceiling height across the proposed accommodation in line with internal space standards set out in Policy D6 of the London Plan 2021.
description: Proposed change of use of ground floor office (Use Class E) to residential (Use Class C3) (to reinstate semi detached property to single dwelling)
